column5: Hi everyone!  Been a lurker for a long time and decided to join in today. A new member of OFAH and a lover of our great Ontario outdoors. Just got into fishing in the last couple of years and want to LEARN everything I can.  A great day is time in the canoe trying to figure out where the fish are hiding and what they want!  Looking forward to continue learning from you guys and gals.  Cheers, Barn
Welcome Barnie.  Interesting name.  Is there a story behind it?  Cheers,  Joey
Welcome, Barney.  Your handle has something to do with Freda Payne?
Let me be amung the first to welcome you aboard to our board...hehe
Welcome! Canoes are for thin guys!
Welcome Barney, great introduction...  Jen
Welcome;  I too recently joined and enjoying it greatly... You won't be dissapointed  Easton.
I guess you don't want me shortening it to "Barnie's band" eh? Welcome aboard.
Welcome aboard Barnie's Band of Gold.  Kick your shoes off any stay awhile.  This is a great fishing community.  FOTB
Hey Barn..welcome to the community!!  I too am curious about the name......do tell  bly

Wow it feels great to be welcomed by so many long time members.  I had no idea my choice of handle would result in such inquisitiveness. Simply, I have two Golden Retrievers. The youngest "Barnie" thinks he runs the show and hence we are all part of his "band" - the reference to "gold" should now be obvious.  Figured all the good handles were already taken so settled on one unlikely to be used by anyone else.  I didn't want to give myself a "fishing" handle and possibly set your expectations too high! But seriously, I love the great outdoors and look forward to continuing my angling education here.  Cheers Barn
Welcome to the family
I was really hoping for the Freda Payne association there.  Oh well, welcome anyway.  I guess.
Welcome to the board! Great into and I'm most impressed that you spelled "inquisitiveness" correctly!LOL Hope you have a long and productive stay! HH
Good to have you joining our little group Barnie, there's always room for one more.
Welcome aboard Barnie  Regards, Sam
Welcome to the board!  I just bought a used canoe last summer and i'm loving it as well. This is a great place and i'm sure you'll love it.  Just try not to get too addicted  Victor
Welcome to the clan

Welcome aboard Barn.  Fishin and dogs ... you'll fit right in.  Glad you moved from lurker to member.  Tons of info here.  After visiting a few other boards ... this is the only one left in my favorites.

welcome aboard!!! its a great board and you will get tons of tips and interesting stories....we look forward to hearing anything you have to add.....me personally am looking soooo forward to this fishing season.....this has been a longgggg winter ( I don't ice fish)
Is there a personal experience you wanna share with us Paul???  Welcome aboard Bernie.
Welcome Barn! I'm pretty new myself, but enjoying my stay so far.
Welcome to the zoo Barney, be careful, it can be addictive.  Maureen
So you finally ditched that flintstone guy and joined the OFC....smart move!
